title: New: Anna River – My Only Source For Love
body: This new track from New York based film student and singer/songwriter **Anna River** is truly heart-breaking. There’s a hint of **Feist** in her delicate yet measured vocals, which are layered to fantastic effect throughout _My Only Source For Love_. Where some would settle for a simple acoustic number, **Anna River** has clearly crafted this track to her own specifications, demonstrated through the addition of a percussion section midway through. **Anna** weeps _‘You’re my only source for love, you’re the only reason why I’m crying’_ in a tone so utterly devastating that it’s impossible to not be moved. Check out _My Only Source For Love_ below, and head over to **Anna’s** [blog](http://www.itrulylikethat.blogspot.com/) for some insightful ramblings and a scrapbook-esque collection of photos.
